speech: Describe a restaurant experience that you like to have today.  You can be as detailed as you like.
What is a restaurant experience that you want to enjoy today? I want to hear from you. You can be as detailed as you like.
Do you have a restaurant experience that you want to enjoy today? Tell me. You can be as detailed as you like.
